key_takeaways: Solution: Follow ACP funnel framework systematically (Difficulty: intermediate)
Solution: Find and dominate a specific niche rather than staying broad (Difficulty: intermediate)

Growth Tactic: Niche down after finding viral content topic (Channel: content)
